title: Augusta County: Henry H. Dedrick to Mary E. A. Dedrick, June 8, 1862
summary: Dedrick discusses military actions in the Valley on the days prior to the Battle of Port Republic. He also records the death of General Ashby of Ashby's Calvary.
keywords: Battle Description, Death/Casualties, Desertion/Leave, Family, Military Authority, Military Strategy, Prisons/Prisoners, Troop Movement, American Civil War
